top_stories.title: Open-E Launches JovianVHR for Ransomware-Resilient Backup
top_stories.description: Open-E, a leading provider of data storage software, announced the launch of Open-E JovianVHR, a new product designed to create an unbreachable, double-layer immutability for Linux Hardened Repository. Open-E JovianVHR is a software-defined storage solution built on the ZFS file system, providing an exceptionally robust and secure platform for a... The post Open-E Launches JovianVHR for Ransomware-Resilient Backup first appeared on AI-Tech Park.

top_stories.title: Automate advanced agentic RAG pipeline with Amazon SageMaker AI
top_stories.description: In this post, we walk through how to streamline your RAG development lifecycle from experimentation to automation, helping you operationalize your RAG solution for production deployments with Amazon SageMaker AI, helping your team experiment efficiently, collaborate effectively, and drive continuous improvement.
top_stories.author: Sandeep Raveesh-Babu
top_stories.content: In this post, we walk through how to streamline your RAG development lifecycle from experimentation to automation, helping you operationalize your RAG solution for production deployments with Amazon SageMaker AI, helping your team experiment efficiently, collaborate effectively, and drive continuous improvement.

top_stories.title: Exploring the future of voice AI with Mati Staniszewski at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
top_stories.description: From audiobooks and dubbing to gaming and avatars, AI-generated voice is breaking into the mainstream — and Mati Staniszewski, CEO and co-founder of ElevenLabs, is helping lead the charge. At TechCrunch Disrupt 2025, he’ll take the stage to talk about what it takes to make voice AI truly human.
top_stories.author: TechCrunch Events
top_stories.content: From audiobooks and dubbing to gaming and avatars, AI-generated voice is breaking into the mainstream — and Mati Staniszewski, CEO and co-founder of ElevenLabs, is helping lead the charge. At TechCrunch Disrupt 2025, he’ll take the stage to talk about what it takes to make voice AI truly human.

top_stories.title: Suffolk BOOST 6 Cohort Drives Innovation in Construction Tech
top_stories.description: BOOST 6 startups are driving the next era of construction with AI agents, robotics, and sustainable materials. top_stories.title: DARPA, State of New Mexico establish framework to advance quantum computing
top_stories.description: DARPA signed an agreement with the State of New Mexico’s Economic Development Department to create the Quantum Frontier Project.
top_stories.author: outreach@darpa.mil
top_stories.content: DARPA signed an agreement with the State of New Mexico’s Economic Development Department to create the Quantum Frontier Project.
